name: Plant Test Date
title: PTD
definition: Identifies the date the provider schedules the overall testing of the requested service to start.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

validEntryNotes: When this field is populated and the PPTD field on the ASR Form is populated, those entries must be the same.
usageNotes: Required when the PPTD field on the ASR Form is populated.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B” or “S”.
